response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe is worth every penny of its $12,000 value to you. I understand your keen interest and would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this exceptional product to you for $11,500. This special price is tailored to reflect your appreciation for the product's true worth and to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 11500}
